content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --LOC
      operator: not_exists
    - name: --DIR
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000098
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --LOC does not exists in a dataset, --DIR exists.
Outcome:
  Message: --DIR variable is present, when --LOC variable does not exist in a dataset.
  Output Variables:
    - --LOC
    - --DIR
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0116
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifer of --LOC.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --DIR
                Section: Events
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifer of --LOC.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --DIR
                Section: Interventions
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifer of --LOC.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --DIR
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
      - FINDINGS
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --LOC does not exists in a dataset, --DIR exists.

Outcome.Message: --DIR variable is present, when --LOC variable does not exist in a dataset.
